name.description: The name of the Kibana service instance

user.description: The user that runs the Kibana services and owns the Mesos sandbox.

xpack_enabled.description: Whether or not to enable the commercial X-Pack plugin from kibana

elasticsearch_url.description: The URL of the Elasticsearch cluster to use for all your queries.

elasticsearch_tls.description: Enable TLS encryption for communicating with Elastic (required when Elastic has TLS support enabled, requires the X-Pack plugin).

user.description: kibana username to use for X-Pack authentication, if enabled

password.description: Password to use for X-Pack authentication, if enabled. Note that you are not setting the password here. You are specifying the credentials for Kibana to use when sending requests.
